import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { User } from '../model/User'; import { UserService } from 'src/app/services/User.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-profile', templateUrl: './profile.component.html', styleUrls: ['./profile.component.css'] }) export class ProfileComponent { id!:number User constructor(private Act : ActivatedRoute,private service: UserService) {} ngOnInit(){ this.id = this.Act.snapshot.params['id']; } } User Profile
